title: Greece to Ban Sale of Spyware After Government Is Accused of Surveillance
description: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis announced the ban after a news report claimed that he had directed the use of spyware against prominent politicians and journalists, which he denied.
dc:creator: Niki Kitsantonis and Matina Stevis-Gridneff
category: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
media:description: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis of Greece has acknowledged that state intelligence was monitoring an opposition party leader with a wiretap.
